about_the_game:
Better Latte Than Never

This mission starts in the troubled city of Prague in October 1938, where the agents must extract a professor of antiquities. What follows is a fast paced, tongue in cheek international romp, laden with puns, and culminating in a battle with the latest in war technology. Can the agents find the fabled elixir of the Aztec god Wannacupate before the bad guys?

In this book you will find:

  • A pulp Section D mission
  • Iconic locations
  • Detailed maps and player handouts
  • Bad guys with spectacular new weaponry
  • New ideas for chase scenes and blowing stuff up with really big guns

Better Latte Than Never is the first in a trilogy of linked missions taking place just before the outbreak of war. Through the trilogy, our intrepid heroes battle against relic hunters, uncover the incredible developments of the secretive GFG, and ultimately face a choice which could change the world forever.

Requires the Secret Files of Section D.

The Secret Files of Section D is a Savage Worlds Adventure Edition powered, pulp action Roleplaying Game, exploring the highly classified files of the British Secret Intelligence Service.

Formed in 1938, SIS Section D is a clandestine operations division officially tasked with gathering intelligence on Fascist and Bolshevik powers in Europe. Unofficially, there are much greater threats to the Empire, and even the world. The setting explores the possibilities that pseudo-science, shadowy conspiracies, miracles and magic, supernatural creatures, and visiting aliens are all real!

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Calum McDermott
